text: The coexistence of both markers is a relatively specific finding mostly encountered in HPV-associated dysplastic lesions, so this biomarker may be used as an adjunctive or triage test to improve the detection of HSIL, in the triage of ASCUS and LSIL cytology (45) or high-risk HPV positive women (46).
